flightsim.simconnect.recv
Class FacilityVOR

java.lang.Object
  flightsim.simconnect.recv.FacilityAirport
      flightsim.simconnect.recv.FacilityWaypoint
          flightsim.simconnect.recv.FacilityNDB
              flightsim.simconnect.recv.FacilityVOR

public class FacilityVOR
extends FacilityNDB

The FacilityVOR structure is used to return information on a single VOR station in the facilities cache.

Since:
0.5
Author:
lc0277

Field Summary
static int HAS_DME
          Set if the station t transmits a DME signal, and if so the inherited DME FacilityNDB.getFrequency() contains valid data.
static int HAS_GLIDE_SLOPE
          Set if the station transmits an ILS approach angle, and if so getGlideSlopeAngle() contains valid data.
static int HAS_LOCALIZER
          Set if the station transmits an ILS localizer angle, and if so getLocalizer() contains valid data.
static int HAS_NAV_SIGNAL
          Set if the station has a NAV transmitter, and if so, getGlideAlt(), getGlideLat() and getGlideLon() contain valid data.

hasNAVSignal

public boolean hasNAVSignal()
Returns true if the station has a NAV transmitter, and if so, getGlideAlt(), getGlideLat() and getGlideLon() contain valid data.

Returns:
true if VOR has a NAV transmitter
